lead_paragraph: The former Michigan State star Mateen Cleaves was arraigned on sexual assault charges in Flint, Mich., a day after he was charged with assaulting a woman at a motel last summer after a charity golf event.

headline.main: Former Spartan in Court for Sexual Assault Charges

snippet: The former Michigan State star Mateen Cleaves was arraigned on sexual assault charges in Flint, Mich., a day after he was charged with assaulting a woman at a motel last summer after a charity golf event.
